name: Déua Pastéis

address.street: Avenida Recife 457 Garagem, ao lado do Café Cirol Royal
address.full: Avenida Recife 457 Garagem, ao lado do Café Cirol Royal, Recife, Pernambuco 50781-000

description: Déua Pastéis is a snack bar specializing in snacks and desserts. Our flagship is the fried pastry. In addition to the pre-defined flavors on the menu, the customer also has the option of configuring the pastry fillings to taste.
